books.title: Eat that Frog!
books.author: Brian Tracy
books.synopsis: I love how this book teaches to get the hard things done with first thing in order to accomplish your goals.

books.title: Atomic Habits: An Easy & Proven Way to Build Good Habits & Break Bad Ones
books.author: James Clear
books.synopsis: This is the most in depth book about how to set and accomplish goals that I've ever read. There are so many step by step approaches.

books.title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
books.author: Stephen R. Covey
books.synopsis: This book is not just about goal setting, but about aligning goals with your personal values and principles.

books.title: Grit
books.author: Angela Duckworth
books.synopsis: A great book on staying strong through difficult things.

books.title: Mindset
books.author: Carol Dweck
books.synopsis: How having a growth mindset can shape how you set and pursue goals.

books.title: All It Takes Is a Goal: The 3-Step Plan to Ditch Regret and Tap Into Your Massive Potential
books.author: Jon Acuff
books.synopsis: Great book with practical steps to accomplish goals.
